1.0.1.name: wordpress/business-card-by-wisdmlabs
1.0.1.description: WordPress Business Card by WisdmLabs is an easy to use, customizable plugin for designing and displaying your business/visiting card on your WordPress website. All you have to do is just enter your data in the 'Business Card' settings page, customize the background & font color using the settings provided, preview your visiting card as you make changes, click on save and voila! it's done. Then just put the shortcode [visiting_card] on the page where you want to display your business card.
